articles.description: What went wrong at the 2024 Copa America tournament and what can be learned from the chaotic scenes that marred the final?
articles.title: Copa America final: Chaotic scenes see 'party almost become a tragedy'

articles.description: Former captain Alan Shearer on why he suspects defeat by Spain in the Euro 2024 final will be Gareth Southgate's last game as England boss.
articles.title: Alan Shearer: 'Defeat may be Gareth Southgate's last - but he'd leave England with head held high'

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Argentina vs Colombia in the CONMEBOL Copa America
articles.title: Argentina vs Colombia: CONMEBOL Copa America - BBC Sport

articles.description: Football often divides opinion - but everyone is united to hail Spain's Euro 2024 success as fully deserved.
articles.title: Spain win Euro 2024: 'The best team lifted European Championship trophy', says pundits

articles.description: Tiger Woods will try his best to win a fourth Open but the reality is the generation he inspired will be battling for the title come Sunday, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: The Open: Why Tiger Woods matters at Troon as those he inspired chase Claret Jug

articles.description: Watch as Chicago Cubs' Christopher Morel hits two home runs against St. Louis Cardinals and is caught by the same fan in the crowd on both occasions.
articles.title: MLB: Same fan catches Chicago Cubs Morel's home runs in match against St Louis Cardinals

articles.description: American Brian Harman says the Claret Jug will leave a "gap" after going "everywhere" with him in the year since he won last year's Open Championship.
articles.title: The Open 2024: Brian Harman 'sad' to give Claret Jug back to R&A at Royal Troon

articles.description: England boss Steve Borthwick says his side must learn from their two narrow defeats by the All Blacks.
articles.title: England tour of New Zealand: Steve Borthwick on team's narrow defeats by All Blacks

articles.description: Australia name Jake Fraser-McGurk to replace the retired David Warner in a new-look squad for this summer's UK white-ball tour.
articles.title: Jake Fraser-McGurk replaces David Warner in Australia squad for white-ball tour of UK

articles.description: After an "all-round perfect performance" to stun Novak Djokovic, BBC Sport looks at how high the Spaniard could still reach.
articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz: What next for Wimbledon champion after winning title?
